data: Much of the tragical lore of the infant mortality, the malnutrition, and the five-in-a-room morality of the cityâ€™s poor is written in statistics, and the statistical path to the heart is more figurative than literal.

Much of the tragical lore of the infant mortality, the malnutrition, and the five-in-a-room morality of the city's poor is written in statistics, and the statistical path to the heart is more figurative than literal.
